title: Emerald Polki Choker - Timeless Elegance, Neelam Haaram
features: Multi-strand choker featuring four rows of emerald beads and pearls, culminating in a spectacular Polki diamond pendant. The pendant boasts a central oval emerald, surrounded by a halo of shimmering Polki diamonds in a closed setting. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of grace. The pendant incorporates subtle elephant motifs crafted with Polki diamonds on the top, reflecting the essence of South Indian heritage. Features fine filigree work and an antique finish.
description: A masterpiece of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship, this choker embodies opulence and cultural significance. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it an ethereal glow, while the vibrant emeralds provide a striking contrast. The intricate design, combined with the enduring quality of 22K gold, makes this a treasured heirloom piece. The subtle antique finish adds to its timeless charm.
